Reviews.Title: everything perfect!
Reviews.Author: Ma Laura
Reviews.Content: Everything was as described in the page. Delivery date too. I recomend this product very much. Everything was perfect. Thanks!

Reviews.Title: The phone was defective, but the supplier made good with a refund.
Reviews.Author: 5Landers
Reviews.Content: This phone had some problems from the get-go. I ended up returning it after some deal breakers showed up - namely random rebooting on its own. Another was that the menu system did not give me the option to connect to Wi-Fi, one of the MAIN reason for getting this phone.  I think the BIOS/ROM instructions may have been a little outdated.Oh, and the manual was Spanish-only.As I said, returned it, the seller gave me no flack about it.On the bright side, they were great people to deal with.  Thanks.

ProductInfo.Features:
Qwerty Keyboard
WIFI
2MP Camera;Display size 4.3 inch
MP3/MP4
optical trackpad
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung S3350 Cellphone - Unlocked Phone - US Warranty - Fuchsia Pink
